## üîç Review Summary

**Overall Impression:**

- Provide a brief summary of your thoughts on the assignment. What did you like the most? Where do you think improvements can be made?

---

## üéØ Scoring Criteria

| **Criteria**                           | **Score (Out of 5)** | **Comments**                                                                 |
|----------------------------------------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **1. Code Functionality**              | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê                 | [Does the code work as expected? Are there any errors or issues?]             |
| **2. Code Efficiency**                 | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê                 | [Is the code optimized? Are there any unnecessary operations or loops?]       |
| **3. Code Readability & Style**        | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê                 | [Is the code easy to read and understand? Are comments and naming conventions clear?] |
| **4. Problem-Solving Approach**        | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê                 | [Is the solution approach effective? Could there be a better or alternative approach?] |
| **5. Creativity & Innovation**         | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê                 | [Has the student used creative or innovative approaches in their code?]       |
| **6. Documentation & Explanation**     | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê                 | [Is the assignment well-documented? Are the explanations clear and thorough?] |
| **7. Testing & Debugging**             | ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê                 | [Has the code been thoroughly tested? Were bugs identified and resolved?]     |

**Total Score:** [Sum of Scores] / 35
